belconnen.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.
belconnen.title: Free Burger

bondijunction.terms_and_conditions:
*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.
bondijunction.title: Lay-by Your Flights for $99*

carindale.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.

carindale.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
carindale.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.

chermside.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
chermside.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

doncaster.terms_and_conditions:
*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.
doncaster.title: Lay-by Your Flights for $99*

doncaster.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
doncaster.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

fountaingate.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.

fountaingate.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
fountaingate.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.

6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.

gardencity.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.
gardencity.title: Free Burger

hornsby.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
hornsby.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

knox.terms_and_conditions:
This October 12th, Butterfly Silver will celebrate 14 years in business. With 20 stores nationally, Butterfly Silver’s flagship store, Morayfield has been welcoming its loyal customers for well over a decade. Close to 15 years of serving Butterfly Silver customers who love the brand and most importantly the ever evolving range!

To celebrate, Butterfly Silver is giving away one Butterfly Memories set per store. Simply purchase an item in any Butterfly Silver store or online and share a special memory with us to enter. Entrants will be required to join the Butterfly Silver Club, which will see them save 10% all future purchases and a yearly birthday gift voucher!

Whether it’s getting engaged, tying the knot, having your first baby or a travel adventure of a lifetime, share your special memory in 25 words or less with their entry forms in-store and you will be in the running to WIN! Full terms and conditions are available online via the Butterfly Silver website: www.butterflysilver.com.au.
knox.title: Butterfly Silver's 14th Birthday

knox.terms_and_conditions:
*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.
knox.title: Lay-by Your Flights for $99*

miranda.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.
  2. You must be at least 18 years old to be eligible to trade in your device for an Apple Store Gift Card. More specific details are available from Apple’s approved partner, where you can learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply. Not all devices are eligible for credit. Payments are based upon the received device matching the description you provided when your estimate was made. Online and in-store values may vary.
  3. More information : http://www.apple.com/au/iphone/trade-in/
miranda.title: iPhone Trade Up - get credit to use towards purchase of a new iPhone

miranda.terms_and_conditions:
Save 20% on Magic Monday

For years Club Life members have enjoyed a special 20% discount on most products available in store during Magic Monday*.  The Magic Monday sale occurs on the first Monday of each month unless the Monday falls on a public holiday, in which case the Magic Monday sale will be moved to Tuesday the day after.

*Discount is off the recommended retail price. Offer excludes food and practitioner lines, however this may vary from store to store. Terms and Conditions apply.
miranda.title: 20% OFF Magic Monday - First Monday of every month!

miranda.terms_and_conditions:
*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.
miranda.title: Lay-by Your Flights for $99*

northlakes.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.

*Terms and Conditions:

1.  The Flight Only $99 Lay-by Deposit is only available on STA Travel’s Exclusive Tickets.
2.  A non-refundable, non-transferable deposit of $99 is payable at the time of booking and is inclusive of a Lay-By service fee of $10.
3.  If you cancel this Lay-by agreement, STA Travel will charge you the $99 non-refundable deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-by Service Fee.
4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.
parramatta.title: Lay-by Your Flights for $99*

penrith.terms_and_conditions:
Trade in your current smartphone and you could get up to A$375 to use towards the purchase of a new iPhone.* Just bring your smartphone to an Apple Store to see if you’re eligible for instant credit, or trade it in online and you could get an Apple Store Gift Card.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. Offer may not be available in all stores, and not all devices are eligible for credit. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. 4.  The price of your ticket will be guaranteed upon receipt of the deposit.
5.  Once the deposit is paid, any changes to your itinerary (e.g. dates, times, routes, names,) will incur change penalties or loss of deposit.
6.  Full payment is due 8 (eight) weeks prior to your scheduled departure.
7.  Failure to make final payment will result in your airline reservation being cancelled. We will refund you all the amounts paid by you under this Lay-By Agreement less a termination charge equal to the $99 deposit, inclusive of the $10 Lay-By Service Fee.
8.  Should you wish to re-book, you will be subject to the price of the new ticket at the time of booking. The original airfare cannot be guaranteed.
9.  Any non-flight products, such as Travel Insurance, ISIC card, Rail Passes etc. cannot be held using the Lay-by Deposit scheme. 
10. You may pay with cash, B-pay, debit or credit card for the amount due. Please note there is a 2% administration charge on all Visa & MasterCard payments and 3.5% administration charge on American Express.
11. Any order placed over the phone to purchase a flight under this Lay-By Agreement is an offer by you to purchase the particular flight on Lay-By for the price notified at the time the time you place the order, on the terms and conditions set out in this Lay-By Agreement. See instore for details.

Get instant credit.

Take your iPhone or eligible smartphone to an Apple Store and you could get immediate credit toward the purchase of a new device.1

Get a gift card.

Simply tell us about your device using the online form and get an instant estimate from our partner. If you’re eligible for credit, just mail in your device for free and your Apple Store Gift Card will arrive soon afterwards.

*A$375 trade-in amount is based on eligible iPhone 6 Plus trade-in rates as at 4 April 2016.

  1. Offer is only available on presentation of a valid photo ID. You must be at least 18 years old. The value of your current device may be applied toward the purchase of a new Apple device. To see if your device is eligible, please visit Apple’s approved partner to learn more about trading in and recycling eligible devices. Some stores may have additional requirements. You will be required to agree to the full terms and conditions available at the Apple Retail Store. Online and in-store values may vary. Apple reserves the right to refuse or limit the quantity of any device for any reason.

sydney.terms_and_conditions: The Privileges member spend & save offer is available to existing and new members of David Lawrence Privileges only. Offer available on full priced clothing, footwear and accessories in David Lawrence standalone stores, online and Myer and David Jones stores (excludes outlets). Receive $50 off when you spend $200 or receive $100 off when you spend $300 (in a single transaction). In store, the discount will be applied at the register. Online use promotion code 'SAVE50' for purchases of $200 (or more) or 'SAVE100' for purchases of $300 (or more) at the checkout to redeem the offer. The discount will only be applied once per transaction, but can be redeemed on an unlimited number of transactions. This offer cannot be used to purchase gift vouchers or on previous purchases and is not available in conjunction with any other offer. Redeem as many times as you like for a limited time only. Offer starts Tuesday 4th October 2016 at 10am AEDT.

tuggerah.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.
tuggerah.title: Free Burger

woden.terms_and_conditions: This October we're partnering with Polished Man, a YGAP initiative, to end violence against children. 1 in 5 children experience violence before the age of 18. That's one too many. Sign up to Polished Man today, tick the box that states “join the movement” and we'll shout you a free burger EVERY DAY between the 4th – 12th of October. It all starts with painting a fingernail. That nail leads to a conversation. That conversation inspires a donation. That donation allows for prevention and protection. Doing good has never tasted so good. Click here to sign up.
